You're invited to

Monster Mash the Fash

Dance party fundraiser for Defend Migrants Alliance

RSVP now
Date

Saturday, November 1st

5-9pm

About the event

ðŸ”¥ðŸ§Š Join us for a dance party in collaboration with local DJs and vendors, raising funds to support migrants in detention! ðŸ”¥ðŸ§Š

As political violence and surveillance escalate, we refuse to be silent, and we refuse to stop supporting one another.

This event is a celebration of our resistance and the need to be loud and unwavering in our fight to protect everyone in our community.

Join us for a night of having fun and building community in the face of fascism, featuring:

  • political education

  • a raffle

  • pumpkin smashing

  • live music from DJ Camisoul, DJ Arkipelago, and DJ Mo Mami!

Location

El Paseo Community Garden

Tickets

Sliding scale, now or at the door. Venmo @CCHRP or pay in cash.

Proceeds will go to @tanggolmigrantemovement to defend and support the rights and welfare of migrants and their families in the wake of increased persecution and violence.
